full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED LHA BCU GSUM MA'I CHO GA SHIN TU BSDUS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,(CES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO LHA BCU GSUM MA'I CHO GA GSHIN TU BSDUS PA 'DI NI, RNAM DKARG DGE TSOGS RLABS CHEN PO'I STOBS KYIS RIGS RUS 'BYOR BA PHUN SUM TSOGS SHING, SNGON GOMS BAG CHAGS BZANG PO'I MTHU LAS, RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE LA MI PHYID PA'I DAD PA DANG LDAN PA, HAR CHEN YI DAM SKYABS DBANG GIS GSER DUL MAndAL, GDAN SNYIL 'BOL SOGS DNGOS SO GYA NOM PA DANG BCAS, 'DI LTA BU'I TSIG NYUNG DON 'DUS, RGYUN GYI NYAMS LEN DU 'KHYER BDE BZHIG DGOS ZHES, LO SNGA PHYIR YANG NAS YANG DU NAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BTZUN GZUGS SNYOMS LAS PA NGAG DBANG CHOS KYI RGYA MTSO ZHES BGYI BAS, 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA CHEN PO'I RGYAL @014B KHAB PE'I CING GI TZAN DAN JO BO LHA KHANG DU BSGRIG PA'I YI GE PA NI, DPYOD LDAN DGE TSUL NGAG DBANG CHOS BZANG NGO, 'DIS KYANG 'JAM MGON BLA MA TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS THAM CAD DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: NGAG DBANG CHOS KYI RGYA MTSO,
